scripts.gen: tsx src/cli/index.ts --nominal data/toy_nominal_poses.json --asbuilt data/toy_asbuilt_poses.json --constraints data/toy_constraints.json --out out/directives.json
scripts.demo:sync-data: node --input-type=module -e "import fs from 'fs'; const source = 'public/datasets'; const destination = 'demo/public/datasets'; if (fs.existsSync(source)) { fs.mkdirSync(destination, { recursive: true }); fs.cpSync(source, destination, { recursive: true }); }"
